name: Unknown Roads
description:
"The roughest road often leads to the top."

- Anonymous

What does that quote have to do with this game ? The word "road". Because there's some roads in this game... I don't know why, but writing this seemed like a good idea. *Sigh*

This is the 6th game I created for #1GAM ( http://www.onegameamonth.com/yeahmenphil). It's a top-down 2D racing game with randomly generated race tracks (that's why the roads are unknown), and it's pretty fun I guess. I had fun making it and I really hope you have fun playing it :D

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_smallphil

Please give me comments, feedback, money, love, power, race cars, or just say hi ! But really, say hi please ? Knowing that people are playing my game that I made in my bedroom for fun is one of the best feeling in the world !

Modes

There's 4 modes included in this game:

- Solo

- Versus (Multiplayer)

- Endless

- Against AI (he's a bit crazy, but shhhh, don't tell him !)


Controls

Escape to return to main menu

Single Player:

WASD or Arrow Keys

Multiplayer:

Player 1: WASD

Player 2: Arrow Keys

SmallPhil <3
